title: What should I do if my laptop's DVD drive is not working? - Quora

response.answer_text: Try re-installing the device driver for your DVD drive. A device driver is a program that operates and controls devices on your computer. They might be provided in a Disk you got from the retailer, but since the DVD drive itself is not working, you can download the drivers from the company's website(toshiba, etc). Hope this helps
